mapper.select: select pum.id, pum.unit, pum.price, pum.coefficient, pum.name, pum.calculate_model, pum.serial_number, pum.model, pum.factory_price from tbl_erp_purchase_material pum left join tbl_erp_format_material_relation fmr on pum.id = fmr.material_id where fmr.format_id = #{formatId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pum.c_display=1
